Yaduwar COVID-19 a European Union/European Economic Area da United Kingdom, 1 ga Janairu zuwa 15 ga Maris 2020

Yawan cutar coronavirus (COVID-19) ya nuna ayyukan da ke da alaƙa a cikin ƙasashe masu ƙungiyar Turai / Ƙungiyar Kasuwancin Turai da Birtaniya wanda ya tabbatar cewa, yayin da ake da alaƙa a cikin ƙasashe, cutar COVID-19 tana ci gaba da ci gaba a duk ƙasashe.

A kan nasarar daga Italiya, kasashe, asibitocin da asibitocin daidaitaccen lafiya suna daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita shawarar daidaita
A ranar 31 ga Disamba 2019, aka bayar da rahoton kungiyar cututtukan kumburta da asalin su ba a san ba a Wuhan, jihar Hubei, kasar Sin.
A ranar 9 ga watan Janairu 2020, China Center for Disease Control and Prevention ya bayyana cutar da ke da alaƙa da cutar COVID-19 a matsayin cutar korona ta ƙarshe da ake kira SARS-CoV-2.
Daga nan, cutar da ke fitowa daga cutar SARS-CoV-2 tana da suna cutar coronavirus (COVID-19).

Abubuwan da ake gani har yanzu shine cewa kusan 80% na mutanen da ke da COVID-19 suna da cutar lafiya mai tsanani, i.e. cutar lafiya ta ƙarfe na ƙarshe tare da ko da aƙalla pneumonia, kuma akwai ƙarin su.
A cikin kashi 14% na cututtukan covid-19, ya zama cutar da ke buƙatar kulawa a cibiyar kiwon lafiya yayin da kashi 6% na cututtukan suna da cutar da ke buƙatar kulawa mai girma.
Mace-mace na mutanen da ake kula da su a cikin gida saboda COVID-19 ita ce kusan 4%.
A cikin wannan bincike, muna ayyana tattarawa a cikin jihar Hubei ta kasar Sin da kuma kasashen da ke cikin European Union/European Economic Area (EU/EEA).

A ranar 11 ga watan Maris 2020, Shugaban Kasa na Majalisar Dinkin Duniya (WHO) ya bayyana COVID-19 a matsayin pandemiyar.
A cikin taron 5 ga Maris na Eurosurveillance 2020, Spiteri da sauransu sun bayyana a cikin taron na farko na CoVID-19 da aka tabbatar da shi a cikin yankin Turai kamar yadda WHO ya bayyana.
A cikin EU/EEA, an bayyana wadanda suka tabbata na farko na farko a cikin Faransa a ranar 24 ga Janairu 2020 a cikin mutanen da suka dawo daga Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

A ranar 15 ga watan Maris 2020, COVID-19 an gano a duk ƙasashe 30 na EU/EEA da Birtaniya (UK), inda tsakanin ranar 31 ga Disamba 2019 zuwa wannan ranar, an ruwaito 39,768 kamuwa da 1,727 mutuwa, tare da 17,750 kamuwa da 1,441 mutuwa daga Italiya kawai.

Corticosteroids da tocilizumab, an anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, ana amfani da su don ilimin cytokine.

Yanayin da ke cikin ƙarancin rigakafin cuta na cytokine storm sun hada da modulating of T cell-directed immune response; the blockade of IFN-γ, IL-1, and TNF; JAK inhibition; blinatumomab; suppressor of cytokine signaling 4; da HDAC inhibitors.
Steroids, a matsayin immunosuppressants, ana amfani da su a cikin ilimin cutar SARS don raguwar girman raunin cutar.
Amma, steroid a cikin yanayin da ya dace ba shi da nasara ga cutar lunga mai girma a cikin masu kamuwa da cutar SARS da COVID-19.
Ba kawai, za su iya haifar da tasirin kai tsaye, musamman cutar osteonecrosis, wanda ya haifar da tasirin dramaturgical.
Duk da haka, ayyuka na tsawon lokaci na corticosteroids a cikin doza da ke cikin girma zuwa girma ana amincewa da su a amfani da su a cikin hankali don masu cutar COVID-19.

Jima'i: SARS-CoV-2 ya kamu da maza fi yawan mata (0.31/100,000 versus 0.27/100,000), kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin wannan rahoton.
Cututtuka da matsaloli: Mutane da cutar COVID-19 da ke buƙatar garkuwa da lafiya suna da alaƙa da cututtuka da matsaloli.
Kuma cututtukan jiki ne ke da alhakin mutuwa a cikin masu cutar SARS.
An bayyana cewa SARS-CoV-2 kuma zai iya bin ACE2-positive cholangiocytes, wanda zai iya shigar da matsaloli a cikin COVID-19.
Ya kamata a bayyana cewa shekaru da lafiyarsu suna da alaƙa da ƙarshe da sauransu da zai iya haifar da ƙarshe.

Abnormal laboratory findings: The C-reactive protein (CRP) level in blood reflects the severity of inflammation or tissue injury and has been proposed to be a potential prognostic factor for disease, response to therapy, and ultimate recovery.
Yayin da yawan CRP ya kasance yana da alaƙa da girman cututtukan COVID-19 da kuma sakamakon su ya kasance an bayyana.
A cikin wannan lokacin, kuma, lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), da creatine kinase (CK) kuma zasu iya taimakawa daidaita sakamakon.

A cikin binciken jama'a da aka yi har yanzu, COVID-19 ya nuna alaƙa daban-daban daga SARS.

A cikin sauran abubuwan da ke da alaƙa, SARS-CoV-2 zai iya ƙara da ƙarfi a cikin ƙafafu na ƙarshe, kuma zai iya ƙara da ƙarfi a cikin ƙafafu na ƙarshe kuma zai haifar da cututtuka masu ƙarfi ko baƙaƙe a cikin ƙarshe na kamuwa da cuta, kamar sauran CoVs da ke da alaƙa da cututtukan ƙarshe.
Don haka, masu cutarwa a cikin yanayi na farko ko lokacin rana za su iya samun yawan cuta da yawa a cikin ayyukan kwanan nan, wanda zai sa mutane suka yi tsanani a cikin tsanani.
Duk da haka, yin bayyana cutar SARS-CoV ya kasance yana faruwa ne lokacin da masu cutar suna cikin yanayin da suka yi nasara, yayin da yawan yin bayyana ba shi da faruwa a lokacin farko.
Don haka, cutar da ke faruwa a yanzu ta COVID-19 ita ce mai girma da kuma daidaita fiye da cutar SARS.

Yanayin yanzu a China suna cikin ƙoƙarin da yawa, ciki har da lokacin da aka rufe Wuhan da biranen da ke kusa da shi da ci gaba da karantawa na kusan kowane al'umma a cikin saƙon yin ƙoƙari don ƙara yaduwar SARS-CoV-2.

A ranar 25 ga watan Maris, gwamnan ya ce cewa sarrafawar-kan jama'a ya kasance yana aiki, a matsayin ayyukan jinyar mara sa lafiya suna daidaita daga 2.0 rana zuwa 4.7 rana.

ya zuwa ga Maris 28, akwai 32,308 lokuta masu tabbatarwa a birnin New York, kuma mutane 672 sun mutu ne daga cutar. A bayanin labaran labarai a ranar 30 ga watan Maris, Shugaban Amurka Trump ya yanke shawarar ci gaba da ayyukan jama'a har zuwa 30 ga watan Afrilu.
A wannan ranar, USNS Comfort, jirgin ruwa na asibitin da ke da kusan 1000 coci, ya shiga New York.
A ranar 3 ga watan Afrilu, Amurka ta samu kimanin mutane 884 da suka mutu sakamakon annobar korona a cikin 24 na lokaci.

A cikin jihar New York, yanayin sun kai 100,000 mutane a ranar 3 ga Afrilu. Gidan gwamnatin Amurka an yi la'akari da cewa ya kawo karuwar haɗari da kuma kawo karuwar bayyanar da bayanai ta hanyar bayar da bayanai na lafiyar jama'a da masana kimiyya zuwa ofishin shugaban kasa Mike Pence.
Ƙididdiga mafi girma na shugaban kungiyar Trump kan shirye-shiryen ya kasance a cikin polarized a cikin ƙungiyoyin siyasa.
Babban hukumomin Amurka da masu magana sun yi kuskure kan Amurka da ta yi amfani da shigo da kayayyaki masu mahimmanci, ciki har da kayayyakin kiwon lafiya masu mahimmanci, daga China.
Gwagwarmayar nazarin ayyukan jirgin sama ana amfani da su don sanya da kuma bayyana ayyuka da kuma aikatawa da aka buga a The Journal of Travel Medicine a tsakanin Janairu 2020.
A kan bayanan da aka yi a shekarar 2018 daga International Air Transport Association, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, da Taipei suna da mafi girman girman mutane daga Wuhan.
Dubai, Sydney, da Melbourne kuma an ruwaito a matsayin wuraren da aka fi shahara ga mutanen da suka shigo daga Wuhan.

Ya bayyana cewa akwai abubuwa da yawa wanda ba a gani ba game da COVID-19, kuma cewa Australia zai nuna tsarin tsaro na iyaka da sadarwa a cikin yanayin da ya dace.
A ranar 21 ga watan Maris, an tabbatar da cutar lafiya ta ɗan adam a Ostiraliya.

Bayan hanyar sarrafa jama'a a Wuhan da Hubei, da yawa na kasashen duniya suna da shawarar cire jama'ar su da kungiyar diplomasiyya daga yankin, galibi ta hanyar hanyoyin da ake kira a cikin ƙasarsu, tare da hukumomin kasar Sin suka ba da izinin shiga.
Kanada, Amurka, Japan, Indiya, Sri Lanka, Ostiraliya, Faransa, Argentina, Jamus, da kasar Thailand ne suka shirya tare da shirye-shirye don tserewa jama'a.
Pakistan ya ce ba zai aika baƙar fata daga China.
A ranar 7 ga watan Fabrairu, Brazil ya ƙi ɗalibai 34 na Brazil ko dangin su tare da ɗalibai hudu na Pole, mutum ɗaya na Sin da ɗan ƙasar Indiya.
Jama'ar Poland, China, da Indiya suka shiga Poland, inda jirgin Brazil ya yi rikodin kafin ya ci gaba da hanyarsa zuwa Brazil.
Jama'ar Brazil wadanda suka tafi Wuhan an rufe su a cikin gundumar sojoji da ke cikin kusa da Brasilia.
A wannan ranar, mutane 215 na Kanada (176 daga jirgin farko, da 39 daga jirgin biyu da gwamnatin Amurka ta shirya) suka fitar da kansu daga Wuhan zuwa CFB Trenton don ajiye su a cikin karfe biyu.
A ranar 11 ga watan Fabrairu, jirgin ƙasa na 185 na Kanada daga Wuhan ya kai CFB Trenton.

Hukumomin Australiya suka koma 277 mutane a ranar 3 da 4 ga watan Fabrairu zuwa cibiyar sadarwa ta Christmas Island, wanda aka sake amfani da shi a matsayin wurin karantawa, inda suka zama na 14 rana.

Ƙungiyar ƙaura ta New Zealand ta shiga Auckland a ranar 5 ga watan Fabrairu; mutanenta (ciki har da daga Australia da Pacific) an keɓance su a cikin ƙungiyar jirgin ruwa a Whangaparoa, arewa maso gabas na Auckland.
A ranar 15 ga watan Fabrairu, Amurka ta bayyana cewa za ta tare da Amurkawa da ke cikin motar kasa Diamond Princess.
A ranar 21 ga watan Fabrairu, jirgin da ke dauke da mutane 129 na Kanada da aka dawo da su daga Diamond Princess ya kai Trenton, Ontario.

A farkon Maris, gwamnatin Indiya ta fara dawowa jama'arta daga Iran. A ranar 14 ga Maris, jirgin sama na South African Airways wanda gwamnatin Afirka ta Kudu ta shirya ya dawo da 112 mutane na Afirka ta Kudu.
An gudanar da gwajin likita kafin shiga, kuma an tsare shida Afirka ta Kudu da ke nuna alamun cutar coronavirus a cikin gida don mitwasa.
Kawai mutanen Afirka ta Kudu da suka yi nasarar cirewa suna cirewa.

An tabbatar da nasarar kwarewa ga duk mutanen Afirka ta Kudu, ciki har da kungiyar jirgin sama, jirgin sama, kungiyar hotuna, jami’an hukumar, da sojojin da suka shiga aikin kare lafiya, wanda a matsayin abin kunya, duk suka ci gaba da nazarin da kuma karewa a cikin 14 na lokaci a The Ranch Resort.

A cikin yanayin yunkurin da ke faruwa a Iran, gidan yanar gizon WHO ya kira tawagar gwajin cikin gida don tantance yanayin. A ranar 28 ga watan Fabrairu, shugabannin gidan yanar gizon WHO suka ce cewa yunkurin coronavirus a matakin duniya zai karu daga "high" zuwa "very high", mafi girman mataki da tantancewa.
Mike Ryan, shugaban harkar cututtukan jama'a na WHO, ya bayyana cewa "Wannan yana nufin kowane gwamnati a duniya: Wake up.
"Ko da yake wannan cuta zai iya tafiya kuma kuna dole ne a yi shirye-shiryen," ya yi kira cewa ayyukan da suka dace na yin hanyar zai taimaka wa duniya "a cikin mafi girman ita".

A cikin real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) ana iya aikatawa a cikin samfuran numfashi da aka samu ta hanyoyin da dama, ciki har da swab na nasopharyngeal ko samfuran sputum.
Aikace-aikace na iya samuwa a cikin sa'o'i ɗaya zuwa 2.
Amfani da RT-PCR test da aka yi a cikin tashin gwiwa ba shi da inganci a cikin mako na farko na cutar.
Bayan haka, cutar zai iya ƙarewa a cikin gwiwa yayin da ta ci gaba da haɓaka a cikin jini.

Don mutane masu cutarwa da aka gwada a cikin wannan matsakaicin, ana iya samar da samfuran da aka samu daga hanyoyin jiki ta hanyar catheter na suction ko kuma ana iya amfani da samfuran zazzabi (sputum).

Wani daga cikin ayyukan PCR na farko an shirya a Charité a Berlin a watan Janairu 2020 ta amfani da polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), da ke da alaka da 250,000 kits don bayarwa ta World Health Organization (WHO).

Jamhuriyar Tarayyar Burtaniya ta yi ƙoƙari ta haɗa wani test a ranar 23 ga watan Janairu 2020. Kamfanin Kogenebiotech na kasar Koriya ta Koriya ta haɗa wani kit na kwayar cuta ta SARS-CoV-2 (PowerChek Coronavirus) a ranar 28 ga watan Janairu 2020.

Yana son "E" gene da ke da alaƙa da duk beta coronaviruses, da RdRp gene da ke da alaƙa da SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group ya kasance ɗaya daga cikin manyan kamfanoni da suka samu izinin amfani a cikin harkar siyayya daga China's National Medical Products Administration don kitin PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In Amurka, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) ke tattara 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel zuwa cibiyoyin kiwon lafiya ta hanyar International Reagent Resource.

40% na kaurin da ake samu a cikin cututtukan hanyar numfashi na iya danganci da amfani da abu na rufe fuska. Amfani da abu na rufe fuska da abu na rufe fuska shine abin da ya fi dacewa da kuma daidaituwa don hana cututtukan hanyar numfashi da cututtukan hanyar numfashi (ARI), a matsayin aikin da aka yi a cikin gida, makaranta, da cibiyoyin jama'a a duniya.
Pneumonia, babban ARI, shine mafi girman abubuwan da suka haifar da mutuwa a cikin yara da shekaru hudu, suka kashe rayukan mutane 1.8 miliyan a kowace shekara.
Yanayi da pneumonia tare sun kai kashi 3.5 miliyan mutanen yara na mutuwa kowace shekara.

A cikin wata na gaba, muka sami bayanin cewa daya daga cikin abokan aikinmu na SF ya yi nasarar cikin cutar COVID-19.
Duk da haka, a matsayin wani abin da ya sa mutum ya fahimta, muka yi amfani da kungiyar maganin cututtuka don lalata duk farfajiya a ofishin San Francisco.
Suna amfani da lamuni na asibiti na anti-viral don saukar da kowane ƙarfi, da kuma kujerar da bankunan elevator da ke kaiwa zuwa ƙofar mu.
Babban birnin ya yi amfani da aikace-aikacen siyayya da ke amfani da kayayyakin da suka taimaka wajen kare lafiyarsu.
